result.description: Ketel Marte homers (21) on a fly ball to right center field.
Tyler Soderstrom doubles (21) on a line drive to left fielder Lourdes Gurriel Jr. Nick Kurtz scores. Shea Langeliers scores.
Ketel Marte grounds out, second baseman Max Schuemann to first baseman Nick Kurtz. Alek Thomas scores. Blaze Alexander to 3rd. Corbin Carroll to 2nd.
Lourdes Gurriel Jr. singles on a ground ball to left fielder Tyler Soderstrom. Blaze Alexander scores. Corbin Carroll scores. Geraldo Perdomo to 2nd.
Alek Thomas homers (7) on a fly ball to right center field.
Adrian Del Castillo out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Lawrence Butler. Geraldo Perdomo scores.
Corbin Carroll homers (22) on a fly ball to right field.
Kyle Teel singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Bryce Teodosio. Luis Robert Jr. scores.
Manny Machado singles on a fly ball to left fielder Alec Burleson. Luis Arraez scores. Manny Machado out at 2nd on the throw, left fielder Alec Burleson to second baseman Brendan Donovan.
Ramón Laureano triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Lars Nootbaar. Xander Bogaerts scores.
Freddy Fermin grounds out, second baseman Brendan Donovan to first baseman Willson Contreras. Ramón Laureano scores. Jake Cronenworth to 2nd.
Jackson Merrill homers (8) on a fly ball to center field.
Nolan Gorman singles on a line drive to center fielder Jackson Merrill. Willson Contreras scores. Masyn Winn to 2nd.
Pedro Pagés homers (7) on a fly ball to left field. Masyn Winn scores. Nolan Gorman scores.
Masyn Winn doubles (24) on a line drive to left fielder Ramón Laureano. Iván Herrera scores. Alec Burleson scores.
Alec Burleson singles on a line drive to center fielder Jackson Merrill. Victor Scott II scores. Brendan Donovan to 3rd. Iván Herrera to 2nd.
Willson Contreras out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Jackson Merrill. Brendan Donovan scores.
Freddy Fermin singles on a line drive to right fielder Lars Nootbaar. Jose Iglesias scores.
